## ./pachctl repo

Docs for repos.

### Synopsis


Repos, short for repository, are the top level data object in Pachyderm.

Repos are created with create-repo.

```
./pachctl repo
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -v, --verbose   Output verbose logs
```
